inputs.name: Start Date
inputs.help_text: Specify the start date for time-bound approval.

inputs.name: End Date
inputs.help_text: Specify the end date for time-bound approval.

inputs.name: Time Zone
inputs.help_text: Select the time zone for the specified time period.

actions.description: Allows users to approve devices for a specified time period by providing start date, end date, and time zone.
Manually approve or unapprove selected devices.

constraints.constraint: If an endpoint is configured for time-bound settings in DDR, it takes precedence over profile group time-bound settings.

errors.description: Occurs when the start or end date is not in the valid format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).

errors.error_message: End date earlier than start date
errors.description: Occurs when the end date is set earlier than the start date.

steps: Navigate to Reports > Device Discovery Report.
Enter the start date, end date, and select the time zone.
